db:abstract.db:para: Overview of how to use the PeakCAN plugin.

db:article.db:para: The PeakCAN plugin encapsulates the low-level API to work with the PEAK-System CAN adapters.

db:td.db:para: Determines the bit rate of the CAN bus connection. The following bit rates are supported: 5000, 10000, 20000, 33000, 47000, 50000, 83000, 95000, 100000, 125000, 250000, 500000, 800000, 1000000. Note that this configuration parameter can only be adjusted while the QCanBusDevice is not connected.
